reqs:
This class will be held in the Life Sciences Centre (LSC), room 1416 (effective May 16, 2016).
Questions about registration should be directed to Dr. Kion at tkion@mail.ubc.ca.
courseName: Seminar in Microbiological Literature - SEM MICB LIT
description: Student seminars on selected papers from the microbiological literature. Compulsory for Honours students. Major students may enrol with permission of the department head.
